thread.title: Mrs Kate E George
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by Mrs Kate E George

author: Mrs Kate E George
title: Mrs Kate E George
text: My daughter bought a blind for my kitchen as a present . When the blind arrived and was installed my husband and I loved it so much we bought two more for our lounge and bedrooms . Fabulous ,helpful service very easy to order great company highly recommend .
